summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4138 for the improvement of Ashworth Avenue from North 80th Street to North 82nd Street; by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 49544, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
